content.description:
There are 5 routes on southside boulder. Getting there is easy. It is 1.5 miles up the canyon. as you head up the canyon you will see the boulder on the south side (river side) of canyon. The first route is a V0 it is about 5 feet to the left of the tree that is closest to the road. There is a V2 10 feet from the tree. There is a V1 between the two rocks and climb up the side pulls and crimps. There is another V1 left of the rocks at the botom and climb to the top most part of the boulder. The V3 is just before the corner towards the river.

Walk off is towards the road by the tree.

A classic of the grade! Start sitting or with the hover butt. Left hand on a side pull right on either the gaston on the arete or the jug to the right. Move up the arete gain the jug under the lip, and move left. A nice mantle finishes up an awesome problem.
content.protection: A conservative person will want 2 pads. The landing has been leveled out with several blocks, but a hole will swallow you up if you pitch back to far. Bring a good spotter.
content.location: On the uphill side of main area. Hop up inbetween a large boulder and one that is probably waist high.
